Code.Description: Requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer.

Code.Name: DTCH
Code.Description: An action by a party wishing to acquire a security. Holders of the security are invited to make an offer to sell, within a specific price range. The acquiring party will buy from the holder with lowest offer.

Code.Name: DVCA
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to shareholders, in proportion to their equity holding. Ordinary dividends are recurring and regular. Shareholder must take cash and may be offered a choice of currency.

Code.Name: DVOP
Code.Description: Distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive. Shareholders may choose to receive shares or cash. To be distinguished from DRIP as the company creates new share capital in exchange for the dividend rather than investing the dividend in the market.

Code.Name: DVSC
Code.Description: Dividend or interest paid in the form of scrip.

Code.Name: DVSE
Code.Description: Dividend paid to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation.

Code.Name: EXOF
Code.Description: Exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash. The exchange can be either mandatory or voluntary involving the exchange of outstanding securities for different securities and/or cash. For example "exchange offer" , "capital reorganisation" or "funds separation" .

Code.Name: EXRI
Code.Description: Call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI). This code is used for the second event, when an intermediate securities'issue (rights/coupons) is composed of two events, the first event being the distribution of intermediate securities.

Code.Name: EXTM
Code.Description: As stipulated in a bond's Terms and Conditions, the issuer or the bond-holder may prolong the maturity date of a bond. After extension, the security may differ from original issue (new rate or maturity date). May be subject to bondholder's approval.

Code.Name: EXWA
Code.Description: Option offered to holders to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of stock , cash, or commodity at a predetermined price, during a predetermined period of time (which usually corresponds to the life of the issue) .

Code.Name: INCR
Code.Description: Increase in the face value of a single security. The number of circulating securities remains unchanged.

Code.Name: INFO
Code.Description: Information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder.

Code.Name: INTR
Code.Description: Regular interest payment distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: A distribution of cash, assets or both. Debt may be paid in order of priority based on preferred claims to assets specified by the security.

Code.Name: MCAL
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, before final maturity.

Code.Name: MEET
Code.Description: Annual general meeting.

Code.Name: MRGR
Code.Description: Exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, ie, an external, third party company. Cash payments may accompany share exchange.

Code.Name: NOOF
Code.Description: Offers that are not supervised or regulated by an official entity and being offered by a party, for example a broker, usually at a discount price, for example broker offer, mini-tender or third party offer.

Code.Name: ODLT
Code.Description: Sale or purchase of odd-lots to/from the issuing company, initiated either by the holder of the security or through an offer made by the issuer.

Code.Name: OMET
Code.Description: Ordinary general meeting.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other event, use only when no other event type applies, eg, a new event type.

Code.Name: PARI
Code.Description: Occurs when securities with different characteristics, eg, shares with different entitlements to dividend or voting rights, become identical in all respects, eg, pari-passu or assimilation. May be scheduled in advance, eg, shares resulting from a bonus may become fungible after a pre-set period of time, or may result from outside events, eg, merger, reorganisation, issue of supplementary tranches, etc.

Code.Name: PCAL
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption With Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date with reduction of the nominal value of the securities. The outstanding amount of securities will be reduced proportionally.

Code.Name: PDEF
Code.Description: Issuer has money set aside to redeem a portion of an issue and the indenture states that the securities could be called earlier than the stated maturity.

Code.Name: PINK
Code.Description: Interest payment, in any kind except cash, distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Changes in the state of incorporation for US companies and changes in the place of incorporation for foreign companies. Where shares need to be registered following the incorporation change, the holder(s) may have to elect the registrar.

Code.Name: PPMT
Code.Description: An instalment towards the purchase of equity capital, subject to an agreement between an issuer and a purchaser.

Code.Name: PRED
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption Without Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date without reduction of the nominal value of the securities. This is commonly done by pool factor reduction.

Code.Name: PRII
Code.Description: An event which consists of two components, the decrease of the amortized value of a pool factor security and an interest payment.

Code.Name: PRIO
Code.Description: Form of open or public offer where, due to a limited amount of securities available, priority is given to existing shareholders.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, at final maturity.

Code.Name: REDO
Code.Description: Event by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated, eg, nominal/par value of security in a national currency is restated in another currency.

Code.Name: REMK
Code.Description: Purchase and sale of remarketed preferred equities/bonds through the negotiation of interest rate between the issuers and the holders.

Code.Name: RHDI
Code.Description: The distribution of intermediate securities or privilege that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event.

Code.Name: RHTS
Code.Description: Distribution of a security or privilege that gives the holder an entitlement or right to take part in a future event.

Code.Name: SHPR
Code.Description: This corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve. It is similar to a dividend but with different tax implications.

Code.Name: SMAL
Code.Description: Modification of the smallest negotiable unit of shares in order to obtain a new negotiable unit.

Code.Name: SOFF
Code.Description: A distribution of subsidiary stock to the shareholders of the parent company without a surrender of shares. Spin-off represents a form of divestiture usually resulting in an independent company or in an existing company. Eg, demerger, distribution, unbundling.

Code.Name: SPLF
Code.Description: Increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are reduced accordingly.

Code.Name: SPLR
Code.DetailedName: Reverse Stock Split/Change in Nominal Value
Code.Description: Decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are increased accordingly.

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading in the security has been suspended.

Code.Name: TEND
Code.Description: An offer made to holders by a third party, requesting them to sell (tender) or exchange their securities.

Code.Name: TREC
Code.Description: Event related to tax reclaim activities.

Code.Name: WRTH
Code.Description: Booking out of valueless securities.

Code.Name: WTRC
Code.Description: Certification process for withholding tax reduction or exemption based on the tax status of the holder.

Code.Name: XMET
Code.Description: Extraordinary or special general meeting.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is CASY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: GROS
Code.Description: Settle money through gross settlement system.

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: Settle money through net settlement system.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is CCPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not CCP eligible.

Code.Name: YCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is CCP eligible.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is LEOG and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is not accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place not to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is MACL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLNT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a client side transaction.

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a market side transaction.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is NETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not eligible for netting.

Code.Name: YNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is eligible for netting.

Validation.Comment: In option H, if Qualifier is REDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: DELI
Code.Description: Financial Instruments have been debited from the safekeeping account.

Code.Name: RECE
Code.Description: Financial Instruments have been credited to the safekeeping account.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a repo collateral substitution.

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the closing or maturity date or the providing of the termination date for an open repo.

Code.Name: PADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a principal adjustment.

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a repo that is part of a pair-off.

Code.Name: RATE
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the repo rate.

Code.Name: ROLP
Code.Description: Relates to a repo rollover of a position extending the closing or maturity date.

Code.Name: TOPU
Code.Description: Relates to a cover of securities position due to deficit of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Code.Name: WTHD
Code.Description: Relates to a return of securities position due to excess of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: 144A
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of an unregistered security issued, pursuant to US legal restrictions 144A.

Code.Name: NRST
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is not subject to restrictions.

Code.Name: RSTR
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is subject to restrictions, and not pursuant to 144A.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SETR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BSBK
Code.Description: Relates to a buy sell back transaction.

Code.Name: CNCB
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral delivery/receipt to a National Central Bank for central bank credit operations.

Code.Name: COLI
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral taker or its agent.

Code.Name: COLO
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral giver or its agent.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Relates to a depository receipt conversion.

Code.Name: ETFT
Code.Description: Relates to an exchange traded fund (ETF) creation or redemption

Code.Name: FCTA
Code.Description: Relates to a factor update.

Code.Name: INSP
Code.Description: Relates to a movement of shares into or out of a pooled account.

Code.Name: ISSU
Code.Description: Relates to the issuance of a security such as an equity or a depository receipt.

Code.Name: MKDW
Code.Description: Relates to the decrease of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corp. event realigned).

Code.Name: MKUP
Code.Description: Relates to the increase of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corporate event realigned).

Code.Name: NETT
Code.Description: Relates to the netting of settlement instructions.

Code.Name: NSYN
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of medium and short term paper (CP, CD, MTN, notes ...) under a program and without syndication arrangement.

Code.Name: OWNE
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving more than one instructing party (messages sender) and/or account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: OWNI
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving one instructing party (messages sender) at one account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a pair-off: the transaction is paired off and netted against one or more previous transactions.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Relates to the placement/new issue of a financial instrument.

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: Relates to a portfolio move from one investment manager to another and/or from an account servicer to another. It is generally charged differently than another account transfer (OWNE, OWNI, INSP), hence the need to identify this type of transfer as such.

Code.Name: REAL
Code.Description: Relates to a realignment of positions.

Code.Name: REDI
Code.Description: Relates to the withdrawal of specified amounts from specified sub-accounts.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Relates to a redemption of Funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: RELE
Code.Description: Relates to a release (into/from local) of Depository Receipt operation.

Code.Name: REPU
Code.Description: Relates to a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Relates to the return of financial instruments resulting from a rejected delivery without matching operation.

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: Relates to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SBBK
Code.Description: Relates to a sell buy back transaction.

Code.Name: SBRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a borrowed holding from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SECB
Code.Description: Relates to a securities borrowing operation.

Code.Name: SECL
Code.Description: Relates to a securities lending operation.

Code.Name: SLRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a holding on loan from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Relates to a subscription to funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: SYND
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of financial instruments through a syndicate of underwriters and a Lead Manager.

Code.Name: TBAC
Code.Description: Relates to a To Be Announced (TBA) closing trade.

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Relates to the settlement of a trade.

Code.Name: TRPO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TRVO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty reverse repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TURN
Code.Description: Relates to a turnaround: the same security is bought and sold to settle the same day, to or from different brokers.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SETS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NSET
Code.Description: Settle through the default settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the alternate settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YSET
Code.Description: Settle through the alternate settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the default settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ASGN
Code.Description: Transfer of ownership of the asset to another party during the closing of an option.

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Tax-exempt financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Taxable financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DLWM
Code.Description: Matching receipt instruction not required (only for concerned ICSD and CSD).

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Settlement transactions relates to drawn securities.

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are exercised.

Code.Name: EXPI
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that have expired.

Code.Name: FRCL
Code.Description: Delivery will be made free of payment but a clean payment order will be sent.

Code.Name: KNOC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are expired worthless.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled.

Code.Name: RESI
Code.Description: Relates to transaction on a security that is not eligible at the Central Securities Depository (CSD) but for which the payment will be enacted by the CSD.

Code.Name: RPTO
Code.Description: Relates to a transaction that is for reporting purposes only.

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery.

Code.Name: SPST
Code.Description: Money and financial instruments settle in different locations.

Code.Name: UNEX
Code.Description: Delivery cannot be performed until money is received.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TCPI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Acting as an agent for tax liability.

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Acting as a principal for tax liability.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TRAN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BOLE
Code.Description: Transaction relates to lending/borrowing.

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction relates to a market claim following a corporate action.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction relates to collateral.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Transaction relates to corporate action.

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Transaction relates to settlement and clearing.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TRCA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Settlement party is a custodian. It receives/delivers the securities and carries out custodial duties

Code.Name: SAGE
Code.Description: Party settles trades on behalf of his client for which he also traded.

Code.Name: SPRI
Code.Description: Party settles its own trades.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
In option B, if Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: WISS
Code.Description: Settlement was done when the security was issued.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: REVE
Code.Description: Reversal of a previously reported movement.

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ASRF, CLCI, CLTR, COMM, CORP, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TCTR, TRCI, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Number must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is BENE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NBEN
Code.Description: No Change of Beneficial Ownership (NCBO). If a standing instruction is in place for change of beneficial ownership (CBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YBEN
Code.Description: Change of Beneficial Ownership (CBO). If a standing instruction is in place for no change of beneficial ownership (NCBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is BLOC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BLCH
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade child.

Code.Name: BLPA
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade parent.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is CAEV and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ACCU
Code.Description: Funds related event in which the income (for example accumulation units) that accrues during an accounting period is retained within the fund instead of being paid away to investors. The retained income is nonetheless deemed to have been distributed to investors for tax purposes.

Code.Name: ACTV
Code.Description: Trading in the security has commenced or security has been re-activated after a suspension in trading.

Code.Name: ATTI
Code.Description: Combination of different security types to create a unit. Units are usually comprised of warrants and bonds or warrants and equities. Securities may be combined at the request of the security holder or based on market convention.

Code.Name: BIDS
Code.Description: Offer to existing holders by the issuing company to repurchase its own securities. The objective of the offer is to reduce the number of outstanding securities.

Code.Name: BONU
Code.Description: Bonus, scrip or capitalisation issue. Security holders receive additional assets free of payment from the issuer, in proportion to their holding.

Code.Name: BPUT
Code.Description: Early redemption of a security at the election of the holder subject to the terms and condition of the issue with no reduction in nominal value .

Code.Name: BRUP
Code.Description: Legal status of a company unable to pay creditors. Bankruptcy usually involves a formal court ruling. Securities may become valueless.

Code.Name: CAPD
Code.Description: The Corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the Capital account. There is no reduction to the face value of a single share (or the share has no par value). The number of circulating shares remains unchanged.

Code.Name: CAPG
Code.Description: Distribution of profits resulting from the sale of company assets, for example, Shareholders of Mutual Funds, Unit Trusts, or Sicavs are recipients of capital gains distributions which are often reinvested in additional shares of the fund.

Code.Name: CAPI
Code.Description: Increase of the current principal of a debt instrument without increasing the nominal value. It normally arises from the incorporation of due but unpaid interest into the principal. This is commonly done by increasing the pool factor value, for example, capitalisation, and negative amortisation.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Non-US beneficial owner certification requirement for exchange of temporary to permanent notes.

Code.Name: CHAN
Code.Description: Information regarding a change further described in the corporate action details.

Code.Name: CLSA
Code.Description: Situation where interested parties seek restitution for financial loss. The security holder may be offered the opportunity to join a class action proceeding and would need to respond with an instruction.

Code.Name: CMET
Code.Description: Announcement of a meeting at a Court.

Code.Name: CONS
Code.Description: Procedure that aims to obtain consent of holder to a proposal by the issuer or a third party intended to progress an event to the next stage. This procedure is not required to be linked to the organisation of a formal meeting. For example, consent to approve a plan of reorganisation for a bankruptcy proceeding.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Conversion of securities (generally convertible bonds or preferred shares) into another form of securities (usually common shares) at a pre-stated price/ratio.

Code.Name: COOP
Code.Description: A Company Option may be granted by the company, allowing the holder to take up shares at some future date(s) at a pre arranged price in the company. A company may not grant options which enable the holder to take up unissued shares at a time which is five or more years from the date of the grant. Option holders are not members of a company. They are contingent creditors of a company and hence may, in some instances, be entitled to vote on and be bound by a scheme of arrangement between the creditors and the company. As many options have multiple exercise periods a company option will either lapse or carry on to the next expiry date.

Code.Name: CREV
Code.Description: An occurrence of credit derivative for which the issuer of one or several underlying securities is unable to fulfil his financial obligations (as defined in terms and conditions).

Code.Name: DECR
Code.Description: Reduction of face value of a single share or the value of fund assets . The number of circulating shares/units remains unchanged. This event may include a cash payout to holders.

Code.Name: DETI
Code.Description: Separation of components that comprise a security, eg, usually units comprised of warrants and bond or warrants and equity. Units may be broken up at the request of the security holder or based on market convention.

Code.Name: DFLT
Code.Description: Failure by the company to perform obligations defined as default events under the bond agreement and that have not been remedied.

Code.Name: DLST
Code.Description: Security is no longer able to comply with the listing requirements of a stock exchange and is removed from official board quotation.

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Redemption in part before the scheduled final maturity date of a security. Drawing is distinct from partial call since drawn bonds are chosen by lottery and with no reduction in nominal value

Code.Name: DRCA
Code.DetailedName: Cash Distribution From Non-Eligible Securities Sales
Code.Description: Distribution to shareholders of cash resulting from the selling of non-eligible securities, for example, in the frame of a depositary receipt program.

Code.Name: DRIP
Code.Description: Dividend payment where holders can keep cash or have the cash reinvested in the market by the issuer into additional shares in the issuing company. To be distinguished from DVOP as the company invests the dividend in the market rather than creating new share capital in exchange for the dividend.

Code.Name: DSCL
Code.Description: Requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer.

Code.Name: DTCH
Code.Description: An action by a party wishing to acquire a security. Holders of the security are invited to make an offer to sell, within a specific price range. The acquiring party will buy from the holder with lowest offer.

Code.Name: DVCA
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to shareholders, in proportion to their equity holding. Ordinary dividends are recurring and regular. Shareholder must take cash and may be offered a choice of currency.

Code.Name: DVOP
Code.Description: Distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive. Shareholders may choose to receive shares or cash. To be distinguished from DRIP as the company creates new share capital in exchange for the dividend rather than investing the dividend in the market.

Code.Name: DVSC
Code.Description: Dividend or interest paid in the form of scrip.

Code.Name: DVSE
Code.Description: Dividend paid to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation.

Code.Name: EXOF
Code.Description: Exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash. The exchange can be either mandatory or voluntary involving the exchange of outstanding securities for different securities and/or cash. For example "exchange offer" , "capital reorganisation" or "funds separation" .

Code.Name: EXRI
Code.Description: Call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI). This code is used for the second event, when an intermediate securities'issue (rights/coupons) is composed of two events, the first event being the distribution of intermediate securities.

Code.Name: EXTM
Code.Description: As stipulated in a bond's Terms and Conditions, the issuer or the bond-holder may prolong the maturity date of a bond. After extension, the security may differ from original issue (new rate or maturity date). May be subject to bondholder's approval.

Code.Name: EXWA
Code.Description: Option offered to holders to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of stock, cash, or commodity at a predetermined price, during a predetermined period of time (which usually corresponds to the life of the issue) .

Code.Name: INCR
Code.Description: Increase in the face value of a single security. The number of circulating securities remains unchanged.

Code.Name: INFO
Code.Description: Information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder.

Code.Name: INTR
Code.Description: Regular interest payment distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: A distribution of cash, assets or both. Debt may be paid in order of priority based on preferred claims to assets specified by the security.

Code.Name: MCAL
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, before final maturity.

Code.Name: MEET
Code.Description: Annual General Meeting

Code.Name: MRGR
Code.Description: Exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, ie, an external, third party company. Cash payments may accompany share exchange.

Code.Name: NOOF
Code.Description: Offers that are not supervised or regulated by an official entity and being offered by a party, for example a broker, usually at a discount price, for example broker offer, mini-tender or third party offer.

Code.Name: ODLT
Code.Description: Sale or purchase of odd-lots to/from the issuing company, initiated either by the holder of the security or through an offer made by the issuer.

Code.Name: OMET
Code.Description: Ordinary general meeting.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other event, use only when no other event type applies, eg, a new event type.

Code.Name: PARI
Code.Description: Occurs when securities with different characteristics, eg, shares with different entitlements to dividend or voting rights, become identical in all respects, eg, pari-passu or assimilation. May be scheduled in advance, eg, shares resulting from a bonus may become fungible after a pre-set period of time, or may result from outside events, eg, merger, reorganisation, issue of supplementary tranches, etc.

Code.Name: PCAL
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption With Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date with reduction of the nominal value of the securities. The outstanding amount of securities will be reduced proportionally.

Code.Name: PDEF
Code.Description: Issuer has money set aside to redeem a portion of an issue and the indenture states that the securities could be called earlier than the stated maturity.

Code.Name: PINK
Code.Description: Interest payment, in any kind except cash, distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Changes in the state of incorporation for US companies and changes in the place of incorporation for foreign companies. Where shares need to be registered following the incorporation change, the holder(s) may have to elect the registrar.

Code.Name: PPMT
Code.Description: An instalment towards the purchase of equity capital, subject to an agreement between an issuer and a purchaser.

Code.Name: PRED
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption Without Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date without reduction of the nominal value of the securities. This is commonly done by pool factor reduction.

Code.Name: PRII
Code.Description: An event which consists of two components, the decrease of the amortized value of a pool factor security and an interest payment.

Code.Name: PRIO
Code.Description: Form of open or public offer where, due to a limited amount of securities available, priority is given to existing shareholders.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, at final maturity.

Code.Name: REDO
Code.Description: Event by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated, eg, nominal/par value of security in a national currency is restated in another currency.

Code.Name: REMK
Code.Description: Purchase and sale of remarketed preferred equities/bonds through the negotiation of interest rate between the issuers and the holders.

Code.Name: RHDI
Code.Description: The distribution of intermediate securities or privilege that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event.

Code.Name: RHTS
Code.Description: Distribution of a security or privilege that gives the holder an entitlement or right to take part in a future event.

Code.Name: SHPR
Code.Description: This corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve. It is similar to a dividend but with different tax implications.

Code.Name: SMAL
Code.Description: Modification of the smallest negotiable unit of shares in order to obtain a new negotiable unit.

Code.Name: SOFF
Code.Description: A distribution of subsidiary stock to the shareholders of the parent company without a surrender of shares. Spin-off represents a form of divestiture usually resulting in an independent company or in an existing company. Eg, demerger, distribution, unbundling.

Code.Name: SPLF
Code.Description: Increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are reduced accordingly.

Code.Name: SPLR
Code.DetailedName: Reverse Stock Split/Change in Nominal Value
Code.Description: Decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are increased accordingly.

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading in the security has been suspended.

Code.Name: TEND
Code.Description: An offer made to holders by a third party, requesting them to sell (tender) or exchange their securities.

Code.Name: TREC
Code.Description: Event related to tax reclaim activities.

Code.Name: WRTH
Code.Description: Booking out of valueless securities.

Code.Name: WTRC
Code.Description: Certification process for withholding tax reduction or exemption based on the tax status of the holder.

Code.Name: XMET
Code.Description: Extraordinary or special general meeting.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is CCPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not CCP eligible.

Code.Name: YCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is CCP eligible.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is LEOG and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is not accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place not to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is MACL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLNT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a client side transaction.

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a market side transaction.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is NETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not eligible for netting.

Code.Name: YNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is eligible for netting.

Validation.Comment: In option H, if Qualifier is REDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: DELI
Code.Description: Financial Instruments have been debited from the safekeeping account.

Code.Name: RECE
Code.Description: Financial Instruments have been credited to the safekeeping account.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a repo collateral substitution.

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the closing or maturity date or the providing of the termination date for an open repo.

Code.Name: PADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a principal adjustment.

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a repo that is part of a pair-off.

Code.Name: RATE
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the repo rate.

Code.Name: ROLP
Code.Description: Relates to a repo rollover of a position extending the closing or maturity date.

Code.Name: TOPU
Code.Description: Relates to a cover of securities position due to deficit of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Code.Name: WTHD
Code.Description: Relates to a return of securities position due to excess of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: 144A
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of an unregistered security issued, pursuant to US legal restrictions 144A.

Code.Name: NRST
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is not subject to restrictions.

Code.Name: RSTR
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is subject to restrictions, and not pursuant to 144A.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SETR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BSBK
Code.Description: Relates to a buy sell back transaction.

Code.Name: CNCB
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral delivery/receipt to a National Central Bank for central bank credit operations.

Code.Name: COLI
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral taker or its agent.

Code.Name: COLO
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral giver or its agent.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Relates to a depository receipt conversion.

Code.Name: ETFT
Code.Description: Relates to an exchange traded fund (ETF) creation or redemption.

Code.Name: FCTA
Code.Description: Relates to a factor update.

Code.Name: INSP
Code.Description: Relates to a movement of shares into or out of a pooled account.

Code.Name: ISSU
Code.Description: Relates to the issuance of a security such as an equity or a depository receipt.

Code.Name: MKDW
Code.Description: Relates to the decrease of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corp. event realigned).

Code.Name: MKUP
Code.Description: Relates to the increase of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corporate event realigned).

Code.Name: NETT
Code.Description: Relates to the netting of settlement instructions.

Code.Name: NSYN
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of medium and short term paper (CP, CD, MTN, notes ...) under a program and without syndication arrangement.

Code.Name: OWNE
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving more than one instructing party (messages sender) and/or account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: OWNI
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving one instructing party (messages sender) at one account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a pair-off: the transaction is paired off and netted against one or more previous transactions.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Relates to the placement/new issue of a financial instrument.

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: Relates to a portfolio move from one investment manager to another and/or from an account servicer to another. It is generally charged differently than another account transfer (OWNE, OWNI, INSP), hence the need to identify this type of transfer as such.

Code.Name: REAL
Code.Description: Relates to a realignment of positions.

Code.Name: REDI
Code.Description: Relates to the withdrawal of specified amounts from specified sub-accounts.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Relates to a redemption of Funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: RELE
Code.Description: Relates to a release (into/from local) of Depository Receipt operation.

Code.Name: REPU
Code.Description: Relates to a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Relates to the return of financial instruments resulting from a rejected delivery without matching operation.

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: Relates to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SBBK
Code.Description: Relates to a sell buy back transaction.

Code.Name: SBRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a borrowed holding from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SECB
Code.Description: Relates to a securities borrowing operation.

Code.Name: SECL
Code.Description: Relates to a securities lending operation.

Code.Name: SLRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a holding on loan from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Relates to a subscription to funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: SYND
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of financial instruments through a syndicate of underwriters and a Lead Manager.

Code.Name: TBAC
Code.Description: Relates to a To Be Announced (TBA) closing trade.

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Relates to the settlement of a trade.

Code.Name: TRPO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TRVO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty reverse repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TURN
Code.Description: Relates to a turnaround: the same security is bought and sold to settle the same day, to or from different brokers.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SETS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NSET
Code.Description: Settle through the default settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the alternate settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YSET
Code.Description: Settle through the alternate settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the default settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ASGN
Code.Description: Transfer of ownership of the asset to another party during the closing of an option.

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Tax-exempt financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Taxable financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DLWM
Code.Description: Matching receipt instruction not required (only for concerned ICSD and CSD).

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Settlement transactions relates to drawn securities.

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are exercised.

Code.Name: EXPI
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that have expired.

Code.Name: FRCL
Code.Description: Delivery will be made free of payment but a clean payment order will be sent.

Code.Name: KNOC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are expired worthless.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled.

Code.Name: RESI
Code.Description: Relates to transaction on a security that is not eligible at the Central Securities Depository (CSD) but for which the payment will be enacted by the CSD.

Code.Name: RPTO
Code.Description: Relates to a transaction that is for reporting purposes only.

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery.

Code.Name: UNEX
Code.Description: Delivery cannot be performed until money is received.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TCPI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Acting as an agent for tax liability

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Acting as a principal for tax liability

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TRAN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BOLE
Code.Description: Transaction relates to lending/borrowing.

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction relates to a market claim following a corporate action.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction relates to collateral.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Transaction relates to corporate action.

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Transaction relates to settlement and clearing.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TRCA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Settlement party is a custodian. It receives/delivers the securities and carries out custodial duties.

Code.Name: SAGE
Code.Description: Party settles trades on behalf of his client for which he also traded.

Code.Name: SPRI
Code.Description: Party settles its own trades.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
In option B, if Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: WISS
Code.Description: Settlement was done when the security was issued.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: REVE
Code.Description: Reversal of a previously reported movement.

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 If the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) in sequence A General Information indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then sequence B Cash Account Activity and sequence C Free Asset Activity must not be present. Sequence B Cash Account Activity and Sequence C Free Asset Activity are otherwise optional (Error code(s): E66).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) in sequence A General Information indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then sequence B Cash Account Activity and sequence C Free Asset Activity must not be present. Sequence B Cash Account Activity and Sequence C Free Asset Activity are otherwise optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 Within each occurrence of subsequence B1 Activity Information Per Currency, if the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then subsequence B1a Activity Information Per Transaction within that subsequence B1 is not allowed. If field 17B::ACTI is equal to 'Y', then subsequence B1a Activity Information Per Transaction is mandatory. (Error code(s): E95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence B1 Activity Information Per Currency, if the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then subsequence B1a Activity Information Per Transaction within that subsequence B1 is not allowed. If field 17B::ACTI is equal to 'Y', then subsequence B1a Activity Information Per Transaction is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 Within subsequence B1a Activity Information per Transaction, subsequence B1a2 Cash Only Movement Details and subsequence B1a3 Cash and Securities Movement Details are mutually exclusive (Error code(s): E96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within subsequence B1a Activity Information per Transaction, subsequence B1a2 Cash Only Movement Details and subsequence B1a3 Cash and Securities Movement Details are mutually exclusive."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If a qualifier from the list Deliverers is present in a subsequence B1a4, in a field :95a::4!c, then all the remaining qualifiers following this qualifier in the list Deliverers must be present (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DEI2 is present in subseq B1a4, then :95a::DEI1 must be present in another subseq B1a4."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If a qualifier from the list Deliverers is present in a subsequence B1a4, in a field :95a::4!c, then all the remaining qualifiers following this qualifier in the list Deliverers must be present (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DEI1 is present in subseq B1a4, then :95a::DECU must be present in another subseq B1a4."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If a qualifier from the list Deliverers is present in a subsequence B1a4, in a field :95a::4!c, then all the remaining qualifiers following this qualifier in the list Deliverers must be present (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DECU is present in subseq B1a4, then :95a::SELL must be present in another subseq B1a4."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If a qualifier from the list Receivers is present in a subsequence B1a4, in a field :95a::4!c, then all the remaining qualifiers following this qualifier in the list Receivers must be present.(Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::REI2 is present in subseq B1a4, then :95a::REI1 must be present in another subseq B1a4."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If a qualifier from the list Receivers is present in a subsequence B1a4, in a field :95a::4!c, then all the remaining qualifiers following this qualifier in the list Receivers must be present.(Error code(s): E86).
